title: vale needs to have basic documentation and explained in doc guide
body:
### Describe the bug

we enabled vale (all great to iterate and experiment) but we don't seem to have documented that anywhere in contributing guide.

i.e.:
- explain it is not a blocker
- that you can add `triage/needs-vale-rule-tweak`
- document existence of https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/blob/c9e00898b30be0ed710087522da58b294bed6834/docs/.vale and that it is okey to submit PR's to improve it
- ensure the URLs referenced and explaining the rules actually exist:
   - i.e. https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/blob/c9e00898b30be0ed710087522da58b294bed6834/docs/.vale/styles/Quarkus/TermsSuggestions.yml#L18 refers to https://redhat-documentation.github.io/vale-at-red-hat/docs/reference-guide/termssuggestions that does not exist.
   - https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/blob/c9e00898b30be0ed710087522da58b294bed6834/docs/.vale/styles/Quarkus/Fluff.yml points to https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/blob/main/docs/src/main/asciidoc/doc-reference.adoc but I at least can't find what rules relate to "fluff" :)
   

https://redhat-documentation.github.io/vale-at-red-hat/docs/reference-guide/spelling/ is also broken url.
